visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts Stock Chart with the following specifications: Chart type: candlestick and column. Chart title: 'AAPL Historical'. Axes and labels styling: Use a dark background with white text for titles and labels. Data series: Include two series, one for OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) data and another for volume data. Custom colors: Use a dark blue for the candlestick series and a light blue for the volume series. Additional configurations: Set the range selector to the first option, and configure the y-axes to display OHLC data on the top 70% of the chart and volume data on the bottom 25%.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts Stock Chart configuration is designed to display historical OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) and volume data for AAPL. The chart type is a combination of candlestick for OHLC data and column for volume data. The chart title is 'AAPL Historical' with white text on a dark background. The y-axes are styled to show OHLC data on the top 70% of the chart and volume data on the bottom 25%. The labels and titles for both axes are styled with white text to contrast with the dark background. The candlestick series is colored dark blue, and the volume series is colored light blue. The range selector is set to the first option, allowing users to easily select different time ranges for the data. This configuration is ideal for financial analysis and provides a clear and visually appealing way to display historical stock data.
